CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 7, 1957, pg. A13 reads: "AMEZ Soiree Committee - This group of AME Zionites represents part of the steering committee planning the Autumn Garden Soiree which the Pittsburgh District Missionary Department will sponsor on the grounds of the lavish new home of the Rev. and Mrs. A. Nicholson, 1757 Crestline St., Sept. 15, between 4 and 7 P.M. Mrs. Irene Nicholson, hostess and general chairman, is seated second from right.  Other committee members in picture are, standing, left to right: Mmes. Theodora F. Hawkins, Mattie Gines, Vernell Ramey, Willa Mae Rice, Lucinda Harper, Jimmie Webber, Lilian Johnson and Harriet Coleman.  Seated: Fannie Moncrief, Jessie Henderson and Bernice Dennis. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of twelve AME Zion planning committee members, from left, seated: Fannie Moncrief, Jessie Henderson, Irene Nicholson, and Bernice Dennis; standing: Theodora F. Hawkins, Mattie Gines, Vernell Ramey, Willa Mae Rice, Lucinda Harper, Jimmie Webber, Lilian Johnson and Harriet Coleman, gathered around small square table planning Autumn Garden Soiree in domestic interior with floral wallpaper, another version
